title: Steel equipment

properties.name: description
properties.value: Steel equipment are items made from steel metal. Steel equipment is stronger than iron equipment, but weaker than black equipment. All steel items are coloured light-grey. Steel armour requires 5 Defence to wield, weapons require 5 Attack.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Steel equipment
A player with steel armour equipped.

Steel equipment are items made from steel metal. Steel equipment is stronger than iron equipment, but weaker than black equipment. All steel items are coloured light-grey. Steel armour requires 5 Defence to wield, weapons require 5 Attack.

Contents

  • 1 Weapons
    • 1.1 One-handed melee weapons
    • 1.2 Two-handed melee weapons
    • 1.3 Ranged weapons and ammo
  • 2 Armour
  • 3 Other

Weapons[edit | edit source]

Steel weapons require an Attack level of 5 to wield.

Armour[edit | edit source]

Steel armour is the third-lowest quality armour in the standard spectrum of metal armours (bronze to dragon). Steel armour requires 5 Defence to wear.

Other[edit | edit source]

Trimmed and gold-trimmed steel armour have the same bonuses as standard steel armour. These can be obtained from the member's only Treasure Trails minigame.

Note: Other players cannot trim or bless armour. Players claiming to do so are scammers.
